DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess pharmacokinetic interaction atorvastatin metformin single co-administered healthy volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Interactions Between Atorvastatin Metformin Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Willing adhere protocol requirement sign inform consent form 2 . Healthy male volunteer age range 2055 year weight range exceed Â±20 % ideal weight . Ideal weight = [ height 100 ] *0.9 3 . Subjects history significant chronic disease 4 . Judged good health basis vital sign , ECG , physical exam routine laboratory data trial investigator 1 . Subjects take inducer inhibitor drug metabolism enzyme barbital within 28days prior study medication dose 2 . Subjects Symptoms acute disease within 28days prior study medication dose 3 . Subjects history gastrointestinal disease might significantly change ADME medicine 4 . Subjects history abdominal surgery within food water limit 5 . Subjects history clinically significant allergy include drug allergy 6 . Subjects anaphylaxis atorvastatin and/or metformin 7 . Subjects history plan iodine radiotherapy within 28 day prior drug administration 8 . Subjects history myopathy 9 . Subjects hereditary problem , example , galactose intolerance , Lapp lactase deficiency glucosegalactose malabsorption 10 . Clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range AST ALT > 1.25 time normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5 time normal range Creatinine clearance < 90 mL/min 11 . Subjects history drug , caffeine alcohol abuse ( caffeine > 5cups/day , cigarette > 10/day , alcohol > 30g/day ) ever drink within 7 day prior drug administration 12 . Special diet know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug ( especially , consumption grapefruit juice ) within 7 day prior drug administration 13 . Donated blood within 60 day prior dose 14 . Participated previous clinical trial within 60 day prior dose 15 . Subjects receive drug might confound result trial base medical judgement investigator within 10days prior drug administration 16 . Subjects consider unsuitable base medical judgement investigator
